title: Marketing Officer Job at Future Moves Recruitment Agency Limited
content:
Future Moves Recruitment Agency Limited is a licensed HR firm with expertise in human capital development, talent sourcing, learning & development, HR outsourcing, and more. Our personalized, innovative, and reliable services have led to 75% client referrals, showcasing our commitment to excellence.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

            
    




	We are hiring Marketing Officers who are passionate about visibility, branding, and client engagement. You will be part of the team responsible for expanding our brand presence, increasing deal flow, and driving public-private partnership awareness.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan and execute offline and digital marketing campaigns to boost brand awareness and lead generation
	Identify and pursue new business and partnership opportunities
	Represent the company at community activations, exhibitions, government meetings, and industry events
	Support the creation of marketing content and visual assets in collaboration with the design team
	Track and report campaign performance, audience insights, and ROI metrics weekly
	Maintain strong relationships with stakeholders, media reps, and field partners
	Collaborate with operations and product teams to align marketing goals with business targets


Requirements


	Education: Bachelor’s Degree or HND in Marketing, Mass Communication, Business Administration, or a related field
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in marketing, field sales, or public relations
	Excellent communication, public speaking, and negotiation skills
	Energetic, self-motivated, and goal-oriented
	Comfortable with social media, digital tools, and in-person engagement
	Willingness to relocate to Abuja (accommodation is provided)
	NYSC members currently serving in Maitama, Abuja are also encouraged to apply


Benefits


	Salary: N180,000 - N250,000 Monthly. 
	Willing to Relocate (Accommodation Provided).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruiter.b@fmragency.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
